TopicTitle: Do existing ships inherit new mass and modules of upgraded parts?

Articles.Content:
I upgraded to KSP 1.2 and noticed antennas had their mass increased.

I know some of the data from part files / craft files is stored in savegames and is not impacted by subsequent changes made after your ship is launched.  I also know the developers introduced upgrade functionality a few KSP's ago.

I'm wondering, will existing ships launched prior to 1.2 that are using affected parts have their mass changed?  I have a handful of craft that were perfectly balanced using RCS Build Aid that would be impacted if so.

Also wondering if they will inherit the new part modules if so how that works.  e.g. ModuleDeployableAntenna seems to replace ModuleAnimateGeneric, and I think ModuleDataTransmitter has a few new properties (antennaType, antennaPower, antennaCombinable) and had one removed (ProgressFxModules).  Wondering how that will impact my ships that use stock parts, and the ones that were made using weldments incorporating those modules ( I'm guessing KSP upgrade functions target part names, not part module names?)
